definitions.definition: Having a specific orientation ( positioning or direction ).
examples: During assembly, keep the tab oriented toward the slot that it will later enter.

definitions.definition: Having had an orientation (an introduction to a topic or place).
examples: They are now oriented with the main campus.
I am no expert in geometry, but I am suitably oriented in it.

definitions.definition: In any of various technical senses, admitting or being equipped with a notion of handedness (i.e. of distinguishing clockwise and anticlockwise ). See Orientability on  Wikipedia. Wikipedia
Having (something) as a primary concern or guiding principle; focused on (something).

main_definition: Having a specific orientation ( positioning or direction ).
secondary_definitions: ( often with with or in ) Having had an orientation (an introduction to a topic or place).

( geometry , topology ) In any of various technical senses, admitting or being equipped with a notion of handedness (i.e. of distinguishing clockwise and anticlockwise ). See Orientability on  Wikipedia. Wikipedia
( in compounds ) Having (something) as a primary concern or guiding principle; focused on (something).
